name: Smartphone Sermonnotes

screenshots.caption: Fill in the blank, and enter extra notes by pressing the notes button.
When notes are complete, the notes are emailed to the user, or can be downloaded to the mobile device.
To enter the notes, admin users type in the notes and choose where the blanks and note sections will appear.
Version 2 of sermonnotes (the first used version)

short_description:
This project allows churches to post weekly sermon notes to a mobile optimized web-page.  When users enter notes on their smartphones, and click the submit button after providing and email address, the user receives the notes that they have completed in their inbox.

This project includes the admin tools for creating the sermon note pages, as well as the engine to process the completed web-notes and email them to the user.
summary: A live system for creating, publishing, and saving sermon notes.
